about_the_game:
It’s an icon of style and unparalleled creativity, the first completely original design by Hot Wheels™. So famous that a full-size version was even made, making this awesome car even more epic. We are obviously talking about Twin Mill™, the legendary Hot Wheels™ twin-engine racing car that today becomes even cooler thanks to the new, exclusive “Unleashed” livery. Get behind the wheel of this iconic concept car that combines style and power, to dominate every race like a legend. If there's a car that really can't be missing in a great collection, this is definitely the one!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™ 2 - Season Pass Vol. 1.
detailed_description:
It’s an icon of style and unparalleled creativity, the first completely original design by Hot Wheels™. So famous that a full-size version was even made, making this awesome car even more epic. We are obviously talking about Twin Mill™, the legendary Hot Wheels™ twin-engine racing car that today becomes even cooler thanks to the new, exclusive “Unleashed” livery. Get behind the wheel of this iconic concept car that combines style and power, to dominate every race like a legend. If there's a car that really can't be missing in a great collection, this is definitely the one!

This DLC is included in the HOT WHEELS UNLEASHED™ 2 - Season Pass Vol. 1.
